name: Lost Cartridge
description:
It's been decades since you haven't played this game! At the time, it was your favorite. You hope it will be as good as then. But is this old thing still able to run?

Controls: Arrow keys to move.

Lost Cartridge was made in 48 hours for the Pot-au-Jeu game jam. The theme was “Making something new out of something old” (“Faire du neuf avec du vieux”).

Note: This is actually not just a platform game! Keep playing, there is more than meets the eye.

Fonts

  • Justabit by Alex Sheyn
  • NES Cyrillic by xbost
